items.content_html: A lightweight, open-source web browser extension for adjusting volume and equalizing sound. Built with performance and efficiency in mind, it's designed to work seamlessly on both high-end and low-end hardware. Contributions and pull requests welcome!
items.title: ChristianE00/AudioKit:  A lightweight, open-source web browser extension for adjusting volume and equalizing sound. Built with performance and efficiency in mind, it's designed to work seamlessly on both high-end and low-end hardware. Contributions and pull requests welcome!

items.content_html: "DocuComp is a lightweight and user-friendly tool designed to streamline the management of technical documentation and compliance tasks for developers. With DocuComp, you can efficiently organize, access, and collaborate on documentation, ensuring accuracy and compliance with regulatory requirements.

items.content_html: CryptoConverter is a lightweight and efficient cryptocurrency conversion tool designed to make currency exchanges easy and accurate. With support for a wide range of digital currencies, CryptoConverter ensures you get the most up-to-date exchange rates and a seamless conversion experience.
